name: Gone Bawting
description:
Intended to be played with a 2 stick controller (such as Xbox controller). Use left and right sticks in circular motion to row. Alternatively, you can use keyboard WASD for left and arrows for right oars.

Made in 0 hours for 0hourjam

- nothke

Post-jam version changelog:

- Added splash sounds
- Added splash and rowing particles
- Fixed stutter
- Added green splotches in water for better speed feedback
- Camera is now closer
- Added keyboard controls
- Faux-transparent water
- Right oar is now controllable with keyboard arrows
